scroll.headline: Hi, I am Mayuri
scroll.subHeadline: I am so glad you're here
scroll.info: Born and brought up in India, the land of Gods, I have always had a curiosity to understand spirituality, emotions, and the science of our mind. My quest has led me to travel extensively within India as well as Europe. During these travels, I attended many workshops to master the art of breathing and meditation. And in a way, every place has shaped me and my practice. The journey has been long and arduous, spanning almost two decades. But in many ways, it has just begun.
